titles.title: United States - Taiwan Partnership in the Americas Act
United States-Taiwan Partnership in the Americas Act
United States - Taiwan Partnership in the Americas Act

A bill to support countries in Latin America and the Caribbean that maintain official diplomatic relations with Taiwan, to counter efforts by the People's Republic of China to coerce or pressure governments into breaking such ties, to deepen coordination with Taiwan on diplomatic, development, and economic engagement in the Western Hemisphere, and for other purposes.
